title: Eames Style Office Chair EA119 Mesh Black
body: One of the greatest furniture designs of the 20th Century is the Eames Alu Group. It delivers great comfort and adapts to fit the body of the sitter even without the upholstery because most materials used as covers were attached in the aluminium profile sections and simply stretches over time yet still remain sturdy. The Eames EA series is one of the most famous well know office furniture designs in history.
